title: Episode 339: Ight, So Boom...(Feat. Joey Bada$$)
itunes:title: Episode 339: Ight, So Boom...(Feat. Joey Bada$$)
description:
Rapper/actor Joey Bada$$ joins the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote his latest single "THE REV3NGE," as well as all his acting roles, such as 'Unique' in Power Book III: Raising Kanan. Joey Bada$$ brings a very interesting prospective to this weeks episode, especially when discussing polygamy, the highest duties of men and women, being in control in the bedroom, and much more. Joey even explains why he holds back his ejaculations. Enjoy!
